p: Coronavirus has improved air quality in many regions and has reduced the risk of lung and heart disease. The World Health Organization has described NO2 as being toxic to humans. NO2 concentrations above 200 mg m− 3 cause severe inflammation in the respiratory tract.38 Ogen39 found a correlation between death rates and NO2 concentrations with death rates from coronavirus been higher in areas that have experienced prolonged exposure to high NO2 concentrations.
